Class IslandGroup

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.islands.IslandGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
IslandInterface, FixedObject, FixedObjectTower, Serializable
public class IslandGroup extends Object implements IslandInterface, Serializable, FixedObjectTower
Class used to represent an island group
